text: ḏd-mdw ꞽn wsr.w ꞽr.ꞽ-pꜥ.t ḥꜣ.tꞽ-ꜥ ꞽm.ꞽ-rʾ-šmꜥ.t pꜣ-ḏi̯-ḥr.w-rs-n.t mꜣꜥ-ḫrw
translation: Words speak through Osiris, Iri-pat, Hati-a, head of Upper Egypt Padihorresnet, the righteous.

translation: The elder of the dockyard, #lc: 4# Hakti.
Archer in front of the Vizier!

text: ꞽw pꜣ ḥr.ꞽ-rḫt.ꞽ.w.w-n-pr-ꜥꜣ-ꜥnḫ-wḏꜣ-snb ḥr šmi̯.t r mr.yt ꞽw ḥꜣ.tꞽ ⸗f ḥwꜣ r-ꞽqr zp-2 m-sꜣ nꜣ ꜥḥꜣ.wtꞽ m-ḏi̯ ⸗f m-mn.t
translation: Then the leader of the launderers of Pharaoh - LHG - went to the shore, while his heart was extremely disgusting because of the daily quarrels with him.
